trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Lawrence
There was one other sighting in Lawrence on or around July 27th 2011
Summary: I started sky watching at aruond 2:00 am this morning after only 5:min I cought sight of a tryangle formation traveling at a good clip when one of the corners sepperated while leaving the other two stationary
divs: Sighting Details I started sky watching at aruond 2:00AM this morning after only 5:min I cought sight of a triangle formation traveling at a good clip when one of the corners sepperated while leaving the other two stationary after dooing a couple of lardge arcs it left the area I couldn't figure out the shapes of the crafts. I had a good feeling it was going to be a good morning. My wife who thinks i am crazy & never goes out viewing with me and allsoe thinks i'm full of **** finally gave in and decided to spend some time with me She got the suprize of her life after only 5 min 2 craft approached us at about 40 MPH and a height of only 500 ft approx they decided to park almost directly overhead 2 beautafull saucers one approx 70 ft and the other about 30 ft across they stayed till around 6:00AM this was whitnessed allsoe by 2 of my children 23 yrs & 14 yrs and some of my early Riseing neighbors
